author: Deepa Seetharaman
title: Facebook Controversy: What to Know About Cambridge Analytica and Your Data
text:
This week’s uproar over Facebook Inc. started years ago, with the mishandling of user data. Now that incident, and what followed, is at the center of a debate over how well the world’s largest social network protects its trove of user data.
What is the current fuss about? The crisis arose from news that Cambridge Analytica, a data firm with ties to President Donald Trump’s 2016 campaign, had improperly accessed data on tens of millions of Facebook users.
...
